Question
========

In a sample of 200 mothers, 140 mothers are found to have no depression (score 0), 45 mothers have subclinical depression (score 1) and 15 mothers have clinical depression (score 2).

Calculate the cumulative probability of having subclinical depression or lower. 
Answerlist
----------
* 0.23
* 0.38
* 0.70
* 0.93

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
